text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(I need to keep track of the other<n>racers and save my
strength for the<n>final leg of the race.)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(This strategy will allow me to make<n>use of my speed while
also ensuring<n>a higher chance at victory. I'm certain<n>that
this is the correct path for me...<n>but...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ("You sound almost jealous there.")

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(Why won't the words of Team<n>Sirius's trainer leave my
head?)

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
C'mon! The hell you waitin' for?! If<n>you wanna be the best
in Japan, you<n>better start runnin'!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: O-okaaaay!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (I thought I was facing my dreams<n>head-on...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (But then... why does it feel like my<n>view's grown foggy?)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: One more lap!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Congratulations on your win today!That's two in a row! Two!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, thank you, but... you've been<n>congratulating me all day...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
And I'll congratulate you a billion<n>times more! You were just
that<n>amazing!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Especially in the homestretch! Youbroke from the pack like peeeew! It must feel so good toleave everyone behind like that!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'm still working on my pace and<n>stuff, so I'm not sure how
you do it.<n>I'll just have to practice more!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Um... Suzuka? You seem pretty sad<n>for someone who just
won a race...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah, no, I'm very happy I won.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
But what about you, Special Week?<n>Team Sirius seems like
a very... lively<n>team.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, they're all super fun and kind!<n>They're even helping
me figure out<n>my own style.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Every once in a while, Gold Ship will<n>force me to do some
weird training,<n>but... overall, I'm super happy I<n>joined their
team!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...That's good.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, yep! This team'll take me all<n>the way to being the
best racer in all<n>of Japan!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (She really is facing her dreams<n>head-on.)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hey, Suzuka, you're spacing out<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Ah, sorry.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Something on your mind? You're not<n>acting like someone
who just won<n>twice in a row.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I just... don't understand.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I won my last race, but the scenery in<n>front of me felt off
somehow...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps you could use a break.<n>Knowledge is power, but
you can't<n>use that power if you're stressed.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, but the Derby is coming<n>up next. I don't have
time to relax.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I have to keep winning...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Phew...

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Looks like you've got the pacing<n>down for a 2,400-meter
race! I noticed<n>you still have stamina to burn.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: You've got what it takes to dominateall the Classic races. Win andmake your dreams come true!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Spe! What's your dream again?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: To become... the best racer in<n>Japaaan!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Now show me what the<n>best in Japan is made
of! No pain, no<n>gain!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Okaaaay!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wait a minute, why aren't youtraining?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(...I don't have time to get distracted. I<n>have to make my
dreams come true!)

text_block_list.name: Mon√≥logo
text_block_list.text: Raaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Her speed is the real deal! And she<n>takes the Derby crown
with a<n>runaway finish!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The fan favorite Silence Suzuka<n>struggled today, coming in
at ninth<n>place!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...Ngh!
